districts.summary: Discover the vibrant community of Rotaract clubs in this district, where young professionals develop leadership skills and implement innovative service projects addressing local needs. Join us in making a positive impact through fellowship, professional development, and community service.

Discover the vibrant community of Rotaract clubs in this district, where young professionals develop leadership skills and implement innovative service projects addressing local needs. Join us in making a positive impact through fellowship, professional development, and community service.

District 3850 is home of young, vibrant, and active Rotaractors and Interactors. As the district where the first Rotaract Club was chartered, District 3850 continues to imbibe the organization’s motto “Fellowship Through Service” and commits themselves to innovative ways of learning, giving, and educating the community towards progress.

Discover the vibrant community of Rotaract clubs in this district, where young professionals develop leadership skills and implement innovative service projects addressing local needs. Join us in making a positive impact through fellowship, professional development, and community service.

rotaractStatisticsCards.title: Rotaractors Around the World as of April 2025
rotaractStatisticsCards.description: Rotaract has become a global movement with over 133,885 members in more than 9,397 clubs across 180 countries. Rotaract members are making significant impacts in their communities through service projects, leadership development, and international cooperation initiatives.

rotaractStatisticsCards.title: Rotaract Clubs in the Philippines as of April 2025
rotaractStatisticsCards.description: The Philippines is home to 608 Rotaract clubs distributed across 10 districts. The strong Rotaract presence in the country reflects the commitment of young Filipino professionals and students to service, leadership, and community development through the Rotary network.

rotaractStatisticsCards.title: Rotaract Members in the Philippines as of April 2025
rotaractStatisticsCards.description: With 8,094 active members, Philippine Rotaract represents one of the largest and most active Rotaract communities globally. These young leaders are engaged in numerous service projects, professional development initiatives, and cross-district collaborations through the MDIO framework.

rotaractStatisticsCharts.title: PH Rotaract Contributions (Per district in USD)

leadershipChair.name: Nick Paira
leadershipChair.title: Pilipinas Multi-District Information Organization, Chair
leadershipChair.description: Leading with dedication and innovation, our Chair works tirelessly to strengthen Rotaract's presence and impact across the Philippines, fostering collaboration between districts and empowering the next generation of leaders.

introduction.title: Supporting The Rotary Foundation's Global Impact
introduction.content: The Rotary Foundation transforms your gifts into service projects that change lives both close to home and around the world. Since 1917, the Foundation has spent more than $4 billion on life-changing, sustainable projects that help people in need with access to safe water, medical care, literacy, education, and other critical needs. By giving to the Foundation, you become an essential part of these ongoing efforts to create lasting positive change in communities everywhere.

funds.title: Annual Fund
funds.description: The Annual Fund is the primary source of funding for Foundation activities. Your contributions to the Annual Fund help Rotary clubs take action to create positive change in communities at home and around the world. Through grants and projects, Rotary members combat diseases like polio and malaria, provide clean water, improve economic opportunities, and promote peace.

funds.title: PolioPlus Fund
funds.description: Rotary has been working to eradicate polio for more than 35 years. Our goal of ridding the world of this disease is closer than ever. When you contribute to the PolioPlus Fund, you're supporting Rotary's top priority - ensuring that polio is eradicated and that it never returns. Your donation helps deliver vaccinations, transportation, and educational materials.

funds.title: Endowment Fund
funds.description: The Endowment Fund ensures the long-term financial stability of the Foundation and provides essential support for Rotary's programs. Contributions to the Endowment Fund are invested in perpetuity, with a portion of the fund's earnings spent on Foundation programs each year. This provides a steady and reliable source of income to meet the world's greatest needs.

funds.title: Disaster Response Fund
funds.description: The Rotary Disaster Response Fund provides a ready mechanism for Rotary districts to respond quickly to local disasters. Districts in affected areas may receive disaster response grants to provide basic items such as water, food, medicine, and clothing. Your support enables our communities to recover more quickly after devastating natural disasters.
